downloadTitle: Unified Communications - Business Value Tool -Training Resources
detailsSection: The UC Business Value Tool is designed to help Microsoft partner and sales organization explore and accelerate UC opportunities within their customers' organizations. This tool helps identify customers' business objectives, demonstrate how UC can help customers meet their objectives, and provide the financial impact of deploying the UC solutions.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Microsoft Office programs:
    • Microsoft Office Word 2003
    • Microsoft Office Word 2007
    • A Word viewer such as Word Viewer 2003

  • The following may also be required:
    • Adobe Reader (download Adobe Reader)
installInstructionSection:
To use this download:

  • Download the file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.

To remove this download:

  • Delete this document from your computer.
